Name: BustaShip
About the game: BustaShip is an action rhythm arcade game in which you fly a ship through a tunnel whilst trying to avoid all of the obstacles in your way, backed by some wicked beats and stylish visuals! Fly through a series of challenging and difficult levels, but if you touch anything, game over man! Do you have what it takes to overcome all of the musical tracks, or claim the high score in the ever evolving infinite mode!? Compare high scores with friends to see who is the ultimate rhythm pilot
